refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The THead wrapper identifies the Rows of a table that form the head of the table, as distinct from the body (TBody) and foot (TFoot) rows.
Header rows are always rendered at the beginning of the table.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Header rows are often presented in an alternate typographic style, such as boldface.
In paged media, if a table spans across multiple pages, header rows are printed at the top of each new page.
